title: KANAZAWA MASTERING KARATE: KYU KATA
description: Featuring Master Hirokazu Kanazawa and his assitants Manabu Murakami, Nobuaki Kanazawa and Paul Walker you will not only learn the kata s leading up to Dan rank but also the bunkai of each and every move in these katas Including the Heians and Tekki s
Only a true master of the art of Karate can teach this information as he learnt it from his teachers and as well in the JKA Instructors Training program back in the mid 1950 s.
If you want to learn the kata the way an unquestioned Master teaches the kata this is for you. He teaches it slowly and then at full speed.
He points out the common errors and the little things that make the kata into the way it is suppose to be performed.
These videos are full of invaluable information from one of the most respected Karate Masters of all time. --Risingsunproductions.net
